sources.title: Alaska Spirit of the Wild
sources.description: A look at the Alaskan wilderness throughout the year, from the harsh winters to the rejuvenating spring, and the animals (including its human residents) who learn to adapt to the extremes of Alaskan weather.

metadata.Plot: A look at the Alaskan wilderness throughout the year, from the harsh winters to the rejuvenating spring, and the animals (including its human residents) who learn to adapt to the extremes of Alaskan weather.
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 2 wins & 1 nomination total
